contents: <mark>支</mark>可<mark>支</mark>，非常<mark>支</mark>；不<mark>支</mark>可不<mark>支</mark>，非常不<mark>支</mark>。<mark>支</mark>名万物<mark>支</mark>始，不<mark>支</mark>名万物<mark>支</mark>母。故常不<mark>支</mark>，以观其妙；常<mark>支</mark>，以观其酵。此两者同出而异名，同谓<mark>支</mark><mark>支</mark>。<mark>支</mark><mark>支</mark>又<mark>支</mark>，众妙<mark>支</mark>门。
